name: Oroboros (Arrjan Tarach, AntonPalmer, Reactorpanda)
description:
Blast your way out in this first-person shooter and try to find your way out of the dungeon of the lost... Or perish within its endless halls.

How To Play & Controls:
Move - WASD Keys
Shoot - Left Click
Toggle Screenshake & Headbob - C Key
Open Doors - E
Lower Mouse Sensitivity - <-- Left Arrow Key 
Increase Mouse Sensitivity - --> Left Arrow Key 
Heal by Killing Enemies

Members of The Dodecahedron Present(Credits):
x Alex Untoro - Game Design Lead
x Arrjan Tarach - Design Designer
x Anton Palmer - Technically a Designer aka a Tech Designer
x Danny Edvinsson - Level Designer
x Samanta Lundström - Designer Of Games
x Dorothea Wunder - Game Designer but Cooler

This game is a Design Dens Summer Game jam submission from The Designers Of The Dodecahedron.
